mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fixed_asset (asset_type_id, name, purchase_date, price, status) VALUES (#{assetTypeId}, #{name}, #{purchaseDate}, #{price}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE fixed_asset SET asset_type_id = #{assetTypeId}, name = #{name}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, price = #{price}, status = #{status} WHERE asset_id = #{assetId}
mapper.select: SELECT fa.*, at.asset_type_id as "assetType.assetTypeId", at.type_name as "assetType.typeName", at.description as "assetType.description" FROM fixed_asset fa LEFT JOIN asset_type at ON fa.asset_type_id = at.asset_type_id WHERE fa.asset_id = #{assetId}
